clinical_history: Thyroid swelling and suspected nodular disease.
technique: Color Doppler and spectral analysis performed where necessary.
findings: No evidence of DVT; veins compressible with normal flow.
Soft tissue region demonstrates enlarged without fluid collection.
Uterus appears homogeneous; endometrial thickness measures 30.43 mm.
Breast tissue shows hyperechoic lesion measuring 18.73 mm.
Left kidney shows hyperechoic, corticomedullary differentiation preserved.
Right kidney demonstrates well-defined, no hydronephrosis.
Liver appears normal with no focal lesions.
